author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Madras High Court on Monday extended its direction to provide exemption to students appearing for public examinations in the State from appearing for the compulsory Tamil language paper, to all those who have approached the government authorities till Monday.

Noting that the exemption which was granted through an order dated January 25 is being extended in a bid to prevent any unnecessary harassment to other students who have not approached the court, the First Bench headed by Chief Justice S.K. Kaul said.
title: Tamil paper exemption: order extended
